name: Jack Street Poker
description:
Again you're standing in front of the pub and after you've already made a lot of bucks here last time, you're coming back tonight to gamble and boost your cash balance again. This should be an easy night, shouldn't it?

Jack Street Poker is a variation of Poker where you can choose your own bets to maximize your winnings through tactics. Play exciting games and get rich. There's a tutorial mode that shows you how to play and a store where you can buy or exchange chips for money. This game can be either played with Controller or Keyboard and supports two languages (German and English).
